gui.title: Settings
gui.tabpanel-placeholder: Select a module to enter its settings
gui.no-items-placeholder: This module doesn't seem to have any settings yet
gui.reload-to-apply: After modifying this setting, open pages need to be refreshed to take effect

confirm-restart.label: Restart Download
confirm-restart.message:
Are you sure you want to restart download task {name}?
Existing download progress will be lost and download will start from the beginning

confirm-abort.label: Stop Download
confirm-abort.message:
Are you sure you want to stop download task {name}?
Resume from breakpoint is not supported yet, if you need to restart download it will start from the beginning

confirm-remove.label: Remove Download Task
confirm-remove.message:
Are you sure you want to remove download task {name}?
The download task will be completely removed, if you need to download again please click the download button on the corresponding page

provider.label: Download Method
provider.caption: Default uses browser built-in download; other download methods have their unique advantages, but require testing compatibility with your browser
